query: SELECT userId, accessToken IS NOT NULL as hasAccessToken, refreshToken IS NOT NULL as hasRefreshToken, tokenExpiresAt, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), tokenExpiresAt) as hoursUntilExpiry, updatedAt FROM bling_config LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2JcS2SMt4kXiaZg.root --database e5hjdPqiFqSfQ5APk99tn8 --execute SELECT userId, accessToken IS NOT NULL as hasAccessToken, refreshToken IS NOT NULL as hasRefreshToken, tokenExpiresAt, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), tokenExpiresAt) as hoursUntilExpiry, updatedAt FROM bling_config LIMIT 1;
